long_description: The Brooks HVAC Mesh hat is just what you need for a good run in the sun. Moisture-wicking fabric, X-Static(R) sweatband and panels and a quick-drying bill help keep you comfortable. Sweatband and side panels contain X-Static nylon, with woven-in silver fibers, to help manage moisture and regulate body temperature. X-Static also inhibits the growth of odor-causing bacteria; X-Static benefits won't diminish over time. Moisture-wicking polyester fabric pushes moisture away from your head where it can evaporate; fabric dries quickly. Upper part of the Brooks Mesh HVAC hat offers UPF 40 protection from harmful UV rays. Perforated, quick-drying bill; adjustable rip-and-stick strap.
